pacman.game.ashley.components

Class GhostComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.game.ashley.components.GhostComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component

    public class GhostComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component
    Class that specifies the behaviour of the ghosts.

        speed - Speed at which the ghost moves in the game.

        public void respawn()
        Resets all the ghost properties. Stop the music and the ghost is again ready to pursue and kill pacman.

      • stopPlayDeadSong

        public void stopPlayDeadSong()
        Makes the property 'playDeadSong' to false. This indicates that the song cannot play again.
